## BatchOperationsService.batchStartActivity() method

Starts a batch of activities. This operation returns an instance of 'BatchOperationCreationResult' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript

        requestModel: BatchOperationRequest;
    }): CancelablePromise<BatchOperationCreationResult>;
```
